channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Cool Tag Cloud
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Cool Tag Cloud

item.title: CVE-2021-24682|2024-08-03T19:42:15.980Z -- unknown -- cool%20tag%20cloud
item.description: The Cool Tag Cloud WordPress plugin before 2.26 does not escape the style attribute of the cool_tag_cloud shortcode, which could allow users with a role as low as Contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
